nodes.text: The Scarlet Star was a YT-2400 light freighter in the service of the Galactic Alliance Remnant around 137 ABY. It had no set crew or owners and was instead assigned to various crews and mission team as necessary.
The Scarlet Star was used by Monia Gahan and Anj Dahl to leave the Mon Calamari Shipyards and return to the Galactic Alliance Core Fleet prior to the attempted theft of the Imperious.
